titles.title: Promoting Charitable Actions Act of 2009
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to make permanent the enhanced charitable deduction for contributions of food inventory.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

term.name: Social work, volunteer service, charitable organizations

bill.summary: 6/11/2009--Introduced. Promoting Charitable Actions Act of 2009 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to make permanent the special rule allowing a tax deduction for charitable contributions of food inventory by certain noncorporate taxpayers.
